name: Sisyphus2000APKv10
description:
Jovid / Gr2
First ever Unity Project for the IEC+Dinesh Jam. In this VR-game you will enter the flat circle of time to push a miserable old sphere called "Sisyphus 2000" out of it's misery and into the unknown. A Tron styled world with some Greek mythology mixed in to the idea stages. A simple ball movement puzzle with some surprises and endless stairs on the way.

  • No new external store assets were used.

Previous files used:

  • The Skybox from Starfield Skybox (Pulsar Bytes).
  • "BG" music with permission from Magnus Ericsson and a few soundbytes not recorded by us.
  • The Screen Asset and XR-Rig that came with the project.

Everything else, shaders, textures, code and models were created using Blender/Photoshop and Unity guides during the JAM time-limit.

Take a look around and try to find all the details, sound clips and more.

Work in progress.
